goods_details: ['Pay tribute to the outdoor life you live and love with the Alpine Soft Mesh Trucker Hat. This 6-panel unstructured hat features a curved bill, supersoft breathable mesh for comfort, and an adjustable snapback closure for a great fit. Features a Leave No Trace Seven Principles imprint on the inside of the cap.', '6-panel, Unstructured', 'Curved Bill, Adjustable Snap-back Closure', 'Super-soft Mesh for Comfort and Breathability', 'Leave No Trace Seven Principles Interior Imprint', '70% Cotton, 30% Polyester']

["The Women's Kira Trucker Hat pairs well with cozy flannel shirts and cool nights around the campfire. An unstructured 6-panel design with curved bill and adjustable snap-back closure make for a comfortable fit. Embroidered logo patch at front.", 'Unstructured 6 Panel w/ Curved Bill', 'Adjustable Snap-Back Closure', 'Embroidered Logo Patch', '100% Cotton | 100% Polyester Mesh']

["We've taken the same water-repelling and breathable fabric that you love about our rainwear and added it to the PreCip Eco Baseball Hat. Meet the environmentally conscious and high-performing next generation of protection—for your head. The waterproof/breathable, PFC-free Marmot NanoPro™ recycled nylon face fabric lasts longer than ever, thanks to the advanced technology of our microporous coating. The DriClime® sweatband wicks away sweat so you stay dry and comfortable, while the seam sealing prevents leaks. 7 panels and a VELCRO® back closure ensure you get a great fit.", '7 Panel Hat for a Great Fit', 'DriClime® Sweatband', 'Seamsealed for Waterproof Protection', 'Velcro® Closure', 'NanoPro™ Eco 100% Recycled Nylon Ripstop 2.4 oz/yd', 'DriClime® 100% Polyester Lining 2.7 oz/yd | 100% Polyester Mesh Lining 2.0 oz/yd']

["Go ahead and pick up the pace—the lightweight Cadence Trucker Hat is made for high-intensity activity. From the breathable Power-mesh to the moisture-wicking headband, you'll stay dry and comfortable. Adjust the bill and hook-and-loop back closure to find your fit.", 'Made with Breathable Power-mesh', '5-panel, Adjustable Hook and Loop Closure', 'Adjustable Bill', 'Moisture Wicking Sweatband', 'Ultra-lightweight for High Intensity Activities', '100% Polyester', '0lbs 2.36oz (66.9g)']

['Add style points to your next adventure—or at least the road trip on the way there—with the structured, 6-paneled Marmot Angles Trucker Hat. Mesh back panels provide enhanced breathability and comfort, and the adjustable snap-back closure and semicurved bill give you the flexibility to find your favorite fit. Embroidered logo patch at the front.', '6-Panel, Structured', 'Semi-curved Bill, Adjustable Snap-back Closure', 'Embroidered Logo Patch', '100% Polyester', '0lbs 2.22oz (62.9g)']

["From the trailhead to the summit, the weather can take a turn at any time. Be prepared (and protected) for anything that comes your way with the mesh-lined PreCip Eco Safari Hat. The waterproof/breathable, PFC-free Marmot NanoPro™ recycled nylon face fabric lasts longer than ever, thanks to the advanced technology of our microporous coating. It's also seam sealed to prevent leaks. The floatable brim offers steady protection when you want it and folds up easily when you don't, thanks to the magnetic closures on the sides. You'll still get protection on windy days, thanks to the adjustable and removable chinstrap.", 'Adjustable and Detachable Chin Strap', 'Seamsealed for Waterproof Protection', 'Floatable', 'Magnetic Side Closure for Up or Down Brim', 'NanoPro™ Eco 100% Recycled Nylon Ripstop 2.4 oz/yd', 'DriClime® 100% Polyester Lining 2.7 oz/yd | 100% Polyester Mesh Lining 2.0 oz/yd']

['Classic beanie style with subtle detail and marmot logo. Durable, soft and warm, wool blend hat with a low profile. Features a micro fleece sweatband for comfort.', 'Micro-Fleece Headband Lining', '70% Acrylic 30% Wool', 'Micro Fleece', '0lbs 2oz (56.7g)']

["When you're backpacking on an exposed route, sometimes you have to bring your own shade, like the wide-brimmed Shade Hat. The 3-inch floating brim offers weather protection while the UPF-50 rating will help block harmful UV rays. You'll stay comfortable even when the pace on the trek picks up, thanks to the moisture-wicking sweatband and ventilating laser perforation. You'll still get protection on windy days, thanks to the adjustable and removable chinstrap.", 'UPF Protection 50', 'Wide 3" Brim for Sun Protection', 'Laser Perforation for Ventilation', 'Floatable', 'Moisture Wicking Sweatband', 'Adjustable and Detachable Chin Strap', '90% Nylon 10% Elastane 3.2 oz/yd', '0lbs 3.21oz (91g)']
